Description:
About the Role:Responsibilities:Implement ITSM solutions using industry best practices within the ServiceNow platform.
Develop and customize ServiceNow applications, workflows, and scripts, including Business Rules, Script Includes, Fix Scripts, UI Actions, UI Policies, Client Scripts, and Email Inbound.
Create and configure Service Portal and widgets.
Integrate ServiceNow with other systems using REST and SOAP-based integrations, and create scripted REST and SOAP APIs.
Have knowledge of authentication methods such as OAuth 2.0, certificates, and Mid Server.
Implement ServiceNow projects in a Domain-separated instance.
Implement ServiceNow Discovery, Service Mapping, Event Management, and Orchestration use cases.
Manage MID Server installation and configuration.
Develop custom applications within ServiceNow.
Implement LDAP/Active Directory/SSO integration.
Implement Orchestration use cases.Essential Skills:Strong hands-on development experience with ServiceNow scripting and customization, including Business Rules, Script Includes, Fix Scripts, UI Actions, UI Policies, Client Scripts, and Email Inbound.
Experience with Service Portal and widget creation.
Proficiency in REST and SOAP-based integrations, as well as creating scripted REST and SOAP APIs.
Knowledge of authentication methods such as OAuth 2.0, certificates, and Mid Server.
Experience with ServiceNow Discovery, Service Mapping, Event Management, and Orchestration.
Familiarity with MID Server installation and management.
Ability to develop custom applications within the ServiceNow platform.
Experience with LDAP/Active Directory/SSO integration.
Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.Essential Qualifications:Certified System Administrator in ServiceNow.
Certified Application Developer in ServiceNow.
ITIL Foundations certification is preferred.
Bachelor’s degree or equivalent combination of education and experience.Job Details
